Actions.Name: Get a Schedule's details (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns details of a Schedule using the Schedule's unique ID.

Actions.Name: Create a new Open Shift
Actions.Description: Create a new Open Shift in a Schedule.

Actions.Name: Delete an Open Shift (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation deletes an Open Shift.

Actions.Name: Delete a Shift (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation deletes a Shift using the Shift's unique ID.

Actions.Name: Delete a Time Off instance (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation deletes a Time Off using its unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get an Offer Shift request (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns an Offer Shift request by ID.

Actions.Name: Get an Open Shift (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns details for an Open Shift.

Actions.Name: Get an Open Shift request (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns an Open Shift change request by ID.

Actions.Name: Get a Scheduling Group (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns details for a Scheduling Group using its unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get a Shift (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns details for a Shift using the Shift's unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get a Swap Shifts request (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns a Swap Shifts request by ID.

Actions.Name: Get a Time Off instance (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns details for a Time Off using its unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get a Time Off request (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns a Time Off request by ID.

Actions.Name: List all Offer Shift requests (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns all Offer Shift requests in a Schedule.

Actions.Description: This operation returns all Open Shift change requests in a Schedule.

Actions.Name: List all Open Shifts (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns all Open Shifts in a team.

Actions.Description: This operation returns all Scheduling Groups in a Schedule.

Actions.Name: List all Shifts (Preview)

Actions.Name: List all Swap Shifts requests (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns all Swap Shifts requests in a Schedule.

Actions.Name: List all Time Off Reasons (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns the list of Time Off Reasons associated with a team.

Actions.Name: List all Time Off requests (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns all Time Off requests in a Schedule.

Actions.Name: List all Time Off instances (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation returns all Time Off instances in a Schedule
